attributes.background: In a matter concerning Policing of his constituency town Leighton Buzzard & the county of Bedfordshire, Andrew Selous MP lacks public confidence and has failed to sort out major issues of public concerns in his remit of local MP to Leighton Buzzard and Bedfordshire concerning mechanisms of policing.

rejection.details:
The resignation of an MP would be an individual decision for that person, and not a decision for the Government or Parliament as a whole.

The expression "vote of no confidence" is used when talking about a vote in the House of Commons which tests whether or not the Government of the day has the confidence of a majority of MPs in the House of Commons. The concept of the House having “confidence” in someone does not apply to backbench or Opposition MPs.
